name: 150 Balloons! Hot Air Ballooning in Turkey
description:
Join me for the ultimate magic carpet ride above the magical fairy chimney landscape of Cappadocia.

This is the must do hot air balloon Turkey experience that will take your breath away and stay with you forever. 

Hot Air Ballooning and Turkey go together like gin and tonic. And Cappadocia serves up the very best as you join up to 150 hot air balloons floating over this magic landscape. 

I filmed this in May 2022 as I joined the first Bunnik Tour group back to Turkey post-covid.  It was an amazing experience and we jumped at the opportunity to take to the sky in a hot air balloon. 

For more details on Bunnik Tours small group touring program visit: https://www.bunniktours.com.au/
